title: Could Colin Beat Greg at Arm Wrestling? - A Conversation with Colin
description:
Two nerds go toe-to-toe.

Today's topics were submitted by @THIFURIOUS. Leave your suggestions for future conversations in the comments below.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE/MERCH: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Every Tuesday and Thursday, roommates Greg and Colin sit down, and Greg throws a random conversation topic at Colin. In return, Colin usually says something crazy and you get a chuckle. Subscribe so you don't miss the madness.

Subscribe to our channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Follow us on Twitter
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/notaxation

#AConversationWithColin Playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL85130F65C312F61E&feature=plcp

Huge thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

transcript_chunks.text: does anyone think I'm going to win this like is that this a real is this a real question what's up everybody Welcome to A Conversation With Colin I'm Greg and this is my roommate Colin now sometimes Colin says crazy stuff so every Tuesday and Thursday I reach into my random topic pile pulling out toss it at his face Jesus and we talk it out for your amusement if you like that like the video subscribe to the channel share our show with your friends Colin are you ready yes today's topic of conversation is who would win in an arm wrestling match between you and Greg tie Furious well I'll count off what you want us to go on three yeah what's the count off going to be it's going to be one two and go on three okay okay yeah like you're already trying to you're already trying to play with it you're already trying to play with the positioning here I already know what you're up to if you feel yourself sinking down just go to sleep ready yeah hold on I'm scared I feel like it's I'm just going to

already trying to play with the positioning here I already know what you're up to if you feel yourself sinking down just go to sleep ready yeah hold on I'm scared I feel like it's I'm just going to turn around and do the outro wait are you oh you're going to go that okay sounds good okay ready yeah all right and one two three all right well that was a great topic of conversation thank you very much @THIFURIOUS and thank you Colin for your time ladies and gentlemen what do you think you could do to me in an arm wrestling match let us know in the comments then make sure you leave future topics down there then like the video subscribe to our Channel share us with your friends until next Tuesday or Thursday have a conversational day
